recipesJson.name: Savage
recipesJson.author: Slushy
recipesJson.description: This is an all Flavorah recipe if you have been checking out my recipes I love Ry4 and all the different flavors. A creamy sweet luscious vape the coconut really sets in around day 7 blending perfectly with the butterscotch, caramel & tobacco's .I could keep revisiting this but I'm happy with this recipe as it is..
